linkedGraphs.description: The cradle of humanity - a world of ancient glory, waiting to be retaken.
linkedGraphs.name: European Dead Zone, Earth

linkedGraphs.description: A desolate and frozen moon, testament to humanity's ambition and hubris.
linkedGraphs.name: Rathmore Chaos, Europa

linkedGraphs.description: The inner workings of Savathûn's mind, brought to life within a mysterious throne world of her own making.
linkedGraphs.name: Court of Savathûn, Throne World

linkedGraphs.description: A hidden tech-metropolis, untouched by the Collapse.
linkedGraphs.name: Neomuna, Neptune

linkedGraphs.description: A derelict spaceflight complex in the ruins of Old Russia.
linkedGraphs.name: Cosmodrome

linkedGraphs.description: A planetoid with an irregular orbit, converted by the Vex for purposes unknown.
linkedGraphs.name: Arcadian Valley, Nessus

linkedGraphs.description: What remains of humanity on Earth lives in the Last City, under the watchful eyes of the Guardians in their Tower.
linkedGraphs.name: The Tower

linkedGraphs.description: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.
linkedGraphs.name: The Crucible

linkedGraphs.description: Hub for Emergency Logistics and Maneuvers. The base for current Vanguard operations in the Sol system.
linkedGraphs.name: H.E.L.M.

linkedGraphs.description: Legacy raids, dungeons, and other past content.
linkedGraphs.name: Legends

linkedGraphs.description: A long-hidden stronghold sacred to the Awoken of the Reef.
linkedGraphs.name: The Dreaming City

linkedGraphs.description: Engage in illicit activities against the enemies of humanity and other Guardians.
linkedGraphs.name: Gambit

linkedGraphs.description: An ancient evil stirs beneath the shattered surface of our Moon.
linkedGraphs.name: The Moon

linkedGraphs.description: A strange pocket dimension where multiple realities from across the paraverse converge and overlap.
linkedGraphs.name: Eternity

In this playlist, players will encounter Guardians from all platforms where Destiny is played.

overrideDisplay.description: Celebrate the Festival of the Lost by exploring mysterious Haunted Sectors.
overrideDisplay.name: Haunted Sectors Playlist

overrideDisplay.description: This is the classic Destiny 2 campaign difficulty, to be enjoyed alone or with a fireteam.
overrideDisplay.name: Classic

overrideDisplay.description:
Rise to a higher level of challenge.

You will face harder missions and stronger combatants. Recommended for experienced players with a broad arsenal to draw upon.
overrideDisplay.name: Legendary

overrideDisplay.description:
Explore the domain of the Witch Queen and shed your Light upon her schemes.

This is a classic Destiny 2 campaign, enjoyed alone or with a fireteam of friends.

Recommended for all players.
overrideDisplay.name: Be Brave

overrideDisplay.description:
Rise to a greater challenge in this Legendary version of The Witch Queen campaign. Enjoyed alone or with a fireteam of friends.

You will face harder missions and stronger combatants.

Recommended for experienced players with a broad arsenal to draw upon.
overrideDisplay.name: Become Legend
